nowYoungerThanNow: Right now you are younger than right now.
cantPauseLife: You can’t press pause on life.
eachSecondIsUnique: Each second that passes is a second you’ll never get back. Once it’s gone, it’s gone.

lifeMilestones.title: Life milestones
lifeMilestones.disclaimer1: This calendar shows the average ages in which people reach different common milestones in their lives.
lifeMilestones.disclaimer2: The information presented here was taken from different sources and (in the case of Argentina) my own experience consulting different people. This is not 100% accurate but it serves as an example of an 'ordinary' life.
lifeMilestones.disclaimer3: Nevertheless, life is not a race and everyone has their own path. Don't compare yourself with anyone else and just live your life.
